column6: A mutant nation has been created on UTOPIA, off the coast of California.  But what does that mean to the X-Men?  Don't miss the series that delves into the lives and minds of your favorite X-Characters. This issue stars Colossus, Wolverine, Nightcrawler and others! Rated A ...$3.99
